RankDef.description: An outsider who has earned the respect and friendship of the Ashlander clan through honorable deeds.
A trusted friend welcomed at the clan's hearth, accepted into the extended family.
A blood brother or sister of the clan, bound by sacred oaths and shared trials.
One who has begun the journey of understanding Ashlander ways and ancestral wisdom.
A respected member who holds property and standing within the clan structure.
A wise member who leads others through the trials of clan life and harsh wasteland.
A mighty warrior who represents the clan's strength and honor in battle and ceremony.
The war-leader and champion of the clan, second only to the Ashkhan in authority.
A visionary and prophet who communes with ancestors and foresees the clan's destiny.
The paramount chief of the clan, absolute ruler and spiritual guide of their people.
